public: delegate void ADODC::WillMoveDelegate(EventReasonEnum adReason, EventStatusEnum % adStatus, Recordset ^ pRecordset);
type ADODC.WillMoveDelegate = delegate of EventReasonEnum * EventStatusEnum * Recordset -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

summary.span: 表示用来处理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle a event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 命名空间中的函数和对象用于工具从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 Visual Basic。Functions and objects in the namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic. 在大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空间中找到的功能。In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 只有在 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现明显不同时，它们才是必需的。They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
